column4: if a Sparcle GeForce 8600 GT 512MB does not work with Ubuntu, does that mean, that an Asus EN8600GT or any other 8600GT card won't work either?
those cards will work in ubuntu, nvidia works great
do yuo mean booting a system from an ipod, or having ubuntu bootup on an ipod on the screen locally?
i'm talking about having a live system on my ipod.
oic, i guess you could. why you d want to is anyones guess. USB sticks are stupidly cheap now and at less risk to the more expensive ipod
